title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: Presidential pals, the real story of pioneering women, Ha Jin’s novel of a singer in exile, murder in Dublin, ballet school suspense and more.
body:
Careerists and flatterers hover around the Oval Office—but a president needs a ready ear and honest counsel. Review by Barton Swaim
Read the review
To friends, lovers, rivals and himself, the writer was an emotional absolutist. Review by D.J. Taylor
Read the review
